tab1.text1:
Welcome to ASGames Omega,  
 
 Please make a tribe 

 Daily Restarts are at 5:00 am CST 

 This server is a WIP settings and mods are subject to change. 

 We use auto decay, if your tribe is offline for more than 7 days your dinos and structures will be auto-wiped. To check decay time on any structure or dino, target them with your crosshair and type /decaytime for the time remaining. 
 
 Structures that have less than 10 items will decay in 2 days (usually for unmanned taming pens)  

 ANY item that is the same as the recipe is disabled. 

 Do Not use names like 123 or human, Do Not use profanity or derogatory names, these will be renamed.
 
 This is a US server. Please only speak English in General Chat.
tab1.text2:
Boss Arenas are placed on the map for you to do Boss Fights.

 These are for you to use, so use them... 

 ALL Beacons should be placed only at the Arenas

 This is to prevent destorying other players structures or a runaway boss

tab2.text1:
By playing on this server you consent to the rules laid out below: 
 
 -Do not use Profanity in general chat. a filter is in place. 
 
 -Any items or exploits found that bypass the mod progression will be removed immediately and multiple infractions will result in a ban. 
 
 -Do Not use names that are derogatory, offensive, or contain vulgarity.  Your character will be renamed. 
 
 -No excessive placement of structures, pillars, foundations, etc. (i.e. structure spamming) 
 
 -No Building or blocking of caves or concentrated resource locations that include artifacts or loot crates or have more than 6 nodes of resources. 
 
 -No blocking of obelisks. 
 
 -No hacking or abusing any game bugs or game exploits. 
 
 -No dropping or leading/kiting dinos into someones base for the purpose of killing their dinos or destroying their base. This will lead to an immediate ban. 
 
 -No blocking resource spawns with random structures or small bases. 
 
 -No placing structures near an enemy base to cause harassment. 
 
 -No Placing any structure for future building or holding any spot even if its temporary. Random buildings found will have ALL tribe structures wiped. So if you have a new person in your tribe, make sure they did NOT build random buildings on the beach or any location.
tab2.text2:
-Do Not leave taming pens unattended, this would be the same as a second structure and ALL tribe structures will be wiped 
 
 -One 50x50 base per tribe. Do not exceed 20 walls high. 
 
 -Do NOT leave your dinos out use soulballs. Dinos left out in the world will be destroyed. No more than 10 dinos should be out at a time (Except for gachas and other dinos that only produce outside of terminal, or while actively breeding. 
 
 -No racism or verbal bullying in-game,  zero tolerance is in effect for this rule.
 
 -Do not give away or trade tames/saddles to players that have not already tamed/crafted them.  Do not give away or trade items, resources, or Fertilized Eggs to players that are lower level or havent progressed to that stage of the mod/game. 
 
 -Abusing any mechanic or broken ark mechanic may result in you being banned. 
 
 -All Teleporters in the wild MUST be set to public. Failure to do this will result in limiting only 1 per tribe. 
 
 -Do Not hang around players doing bosses or Dinos that give aoe loot just to get free loot or get items that are higher than your progression.  This includes jumping into a fight when you were not asked to. 
 
 -Do not help new players to get egg by killing off wyverns in the wyvven trench or dinos that produce eggs on death. they must get them on thier own. 
 
 -No Breeding of dinos with no gender, these would be mod dinos and are too OP for the mod and not balanced

tab3.text1:
For Consoles Discord link https://discord.gg/eJsHn4mPRg n
 Donations-Shop link https://chronsasastore.tebex.io/ 
 For PC Press F3 For shop 
 
 50 points are earned every 30 minutes to purchase items from shop. 
 
 Earn More points by donating. Use the Purchase Points Button for link 
 
 
 
 If your having problems with fps frames try these settings.
 open command by hitting the ` key above tab on pc 
 
 r.VolumetricCloud 0 
 r.Fog 0 
 grass.enable 0 
  r.Streaming.PoolSize 0 
 r.Streaming.PoolSize 0 
  r.Lumen.ScreenProbeGather.RadianceCache.ProbeResolution 16 
  r.DynamicGlobalIlluminationMethod 2 
 r.ShadowQuality 0
tab3.text2:
You can give donations by purchasing points. 
 
 Click the tab Purchase Points , this will take you to the Tebex store. 
 
 In the store click ARK SHOP ASCENDED then select the pkg, be sure to log in with your Steam account. If Purchasing a Pkg/Subscription be sure to enter your discord name at checkout so that a role maybe provided. Also be sure to link your discord with the server. 
 
 if Purchasing Points use /redeem tbx-id in game chat, which you will be given a tbx-id at checkout. 

 Points are instantly transfered to your player once purchased.

tab5.text1:
To buy Items or dinos use /buy id amount 
 To get kit use /kit id  
 to buy a kit use /buykit id  Starter kit
 See Discord for id

  Kits Available are: 
tame1 = Bow Taming Kit 5000pts 
tame2 = Rifle Taming Kit 7000pts
